meta.title: Skyesoft Rebuild Roadmap
meta.description: Execution roadmap aligned with Codex v1.1.0 governance, Repository Standard compliance, PHP 8 migration, SSE revival, Skyebot semantic AI architecture, and new UI preparation (Office Board polish, index page creation, Codex Page Registry).

phases.name: Codex + Sovereignty Foundation
tasks: Codex upgraded to v1.1.0 with Meta, Constitution, Tier-2 Standards, and Tier-3 Modules
Document Engine created; legacy individual document modules removed
Repository Standard ratified (canonical directory structure, camelCase enforcement)
Semantic Responder Standard approved
RAG Framework Standard approved
AI Integration Standard approved
Skyebot constitutional prompt schema created (semantic, RAG-aware, SSE-aware)
Parliamentarian Review logic created and embedded into askOpenAI.php
Deployment sovereignty reaffirmed: Skyesoft operates solely on skyelighting.com (GoDaddy)
Codex Page Registry framework approved (all UI pages must be registered)
phases.output: Codex v1.1.0 finalized — the system's constitutional backbone is complete

phases.name: Repository + UI Infrastructure Alignment
tasks: Upgrade server environment from PHP 5.6 to PHP 8.x on GoDaddy
Deploy Codex-compliant folder structure to server (no legacy directories)
Upload Codex v1.1.0 + meta files including roadmap.json and roadmapDetailed.json
Upload mandatory static data: iconMap.json, prefixRegistry.json, intentMatrix.json, promptTemplates.json
Upload updated PHP 8 versions of: getDynamicData.php, getVersions.php, cronRun.php
Verify SSE output under PHP 8 using Codex validation rules
Restore index.html and officeBoard.html under Unified Client Architecture Standard
Polish officeBoard.html for production readiness (scroll engine, header block, layout, Codex UI rules)
Create new index.html with HSB, navigation, and Codex visual standards
Create pageRegistry.json and register all active UI pages
Deploy shared JS modules: app.js, sse.js, ui.js, weather.js, skyebot.js
Ensure versionContext appears correctly through getVersions.php
Initialize Document Engine directory structure with empty templates and placeholder bindings
Activate repositoryAuditor.php for daily structural checks
phases.output: Server upgraded, repository deployed, UI framework restored and modernized under PHP 8 with full Codex alignment

phases.name: Live SSE + Dashboard Integration
tasks: Implement real-time SSE stream with full Tier-2 compliance on production
Ensure dashboard uses SSE exclusively for: time, weather, holiday, TIS state, versionContext
Confirm TIS transitions based on holidayRegistry.json and SSE day-of-week
Confirm weather updates follow caching rules in operationalConfig
Add stale-signal warnings for SSE delays > 5 seconds
Activate sseIntegrityChecker.php to validate SSE health and schema
Validate officeBoard.html under live stream: no console errors, accurate scroll completion timing, and consistent display across environments
phases.output: Office Board becomes a fully real-time operational display governed by Codex and powered by SSE

phases.name: Skyebot Contact Intake (Semantic & RAG-driven)
tasks: Skyebot parses email signatures and user prompts into structured contact data
Enforce Prefix Registry for ENT-, LOC-, and DOC- identifiers
Prevent duplication of entity, location, or contact records based on Codex rules
Store new contacts in JSON interim database until SQL migration (Phase 4)
Integrate RAG retrieval from Codex and skyesoft-data.json for context alignment
Use Document Engine to generate contact confirmation sheets when applicable
Ensure Parliamentarian validates all write-side actions before allowing storage
phases.output: AI-powered semantic contact creation with prefix-controlled identity management

phases.name: Database Migration (JSON → SQL)
tasks: Design SQLite schema for entities, locations, contacts, permits, and documents
Include entity type definitions: company, jurisdiction, client, vendor
Enforce referential integrity for all links: entity → location → contact
Migrate JSON records into SQL in canonical order: entities → locations → contacts → documents
Define SQL-based lineage tracking for Document Engine outputs
Update officeBoard and backend modules to read SQL instead of JSON for metrics
Validate that database serves as the unified SOT for structured data
phases.output: Unified, relational Skyesoft data layer with strict referential integrity

phases.name: Document Engine Activation
tasks: Activate Document Engine as the single module for all document types
Implement render pipeline for HTML/PDF creation using Tier-2 Document Standards
Bind Document Catalog entries: permitFeeReport, photoSurvey, workOrderRequest, etc.
Add document lineage indexing into documentIndex.json and SQL (once Phase 4 is complete)
Restore floating header/footer and spacing doctrine for all documents
Migrate any legacy templates or fragments into Codex-aligned templates
Confirm that all new documents follow: icon rules, spacing rules, section semantics
phases.output: Professional-grade, Codex-governed document automation via one unified engine

summaryTimeline.result: Repository & UI architecture aligned under PHP 8, Office Board polished, index page created, Page Registry activated
AI-driven business automation begins (Skyebot contact intake)
SQL backbone ensures long-term structured data integrity
Document Engine consolidates all document generation under Codex standards
